subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Lincoln high school’s Lance Stephenson is seen by many as the next great New York City point guard, following in the stutter-steps of high school stars like Mark Jackson, Kenny Anderson and Stephon Marbury.
snippet: Lincoln high school’s Lance Stephenson is seen by many as the next great New York City point guard, following in the stutter-steps of high school stars like Mark Jackson, Kenny Anderson and Stephon Marbury.
